Texts.Chs: 侦察战机单位注册在守望者名下。日志显示最近与扎希德指挥官的交流。守望者盔甲已收到。^green;这个单位可以以^orange;阿威坎装备的守望者盔甲^green;交易^orange;守望者主题战机替换部件。^reset;全套收集之后返回交付。
Texts.Eng: Detected Droden unit registered to the Watchers. Logs indicate recent interaction with Commander Zaheed. Watcher armour received. ^green;This unit can trade ^orange;Avikan-fitted Watcher armour ^green;for ^orange;Watcher-themed Droden part replacements.^reset; Return with full set to complete trade.

Texts.Chs: 回到位于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的^orange;镜头-88^reset;处
交易接受。提交守望者主题的战机零件替代品。结束谈话。
Texts.Eng: Trade accepted. Handing over Watcher-themed Droden part replacements. Ending conversation.
